{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Coin collecting {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Coin collecting Coin collecting is the collecting of coins or other forms of minted legal tender. Coins of interest to collectors often include those that circulated for only a brief time, coins with mint errors and especially beautiful or historically significant pieces. Coin collecting can be differentiated from numismatics, in that the latter is the systematic study of currency as a whole, though the two disciplines are closely interlinked. A coin's grade is a main determinant of its value. Commercial organizations offer grading services and will grade, authenticate, attribute, and encapsulate most coins. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Coin collecting)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
